00040 #define APS_COMMON_DATA_FRAME_HEADER_LENGTH 8U
00041 
00042 #ifdef _APS_FRAGMENTATION_
00043 #define APS_DATA_EXTENDED_HEADER_LENGTH 2U
00044 #else
00045 #define APS_DATA_EXTENDED_HEADER_LENGTH 0U
00046 #endif
00047 
00049 #define APS_COMMON_INTERPAN_FRAME_HEADER_LENGTH 9U
00050 
00052 #define APS_MAX_INTERPAN_HEADER_LENGTH \
00053   (APS_COMMON_INTERPAN_FRAME_HEADER_LENGTH + MAC_MAX_INTERPAN_MPDU_UNSECURED_OVERHEAD)
00054 
00055 #ifndef _LINK_SECURITY_
00056 
00057 #define APS_MAX_DATA_FRAME_HEADER_LENGTH \
00058   (APS_COMMON_DATA_FRAME_HEADER_LENGTH + APS_DATA_EXTENDED_HEADER_LENGTH)
00059 
00061 #define APS_MIN_AUXILIARY_HEADER_LENGTH   0U
00062 
00063 #define APS_MAX_DATA_FRAME_FOOTER_LENGTH  0U
00064 
00065 #define APS_AUXILIARY_HEADER_LENGTH 0U
00066 
00067 #else /* _LINK_SECURITY_ */
00068 
00070 #define APS_MIN_AUXILIARY_HEADER_LENGTH   6U
00071 
00076 #define APS_AUXILIARY_HEADER_LENGTH  (APS_MIN_AUXILIARY_HEADER_LENGTH + 8U)
00077 
00079 #define APS_MAX_DATA_FRAME_HEADER_LENGTH  \
00080   (APS_COMMON_DATA_FRAME_HEADER_LENGTH + APS_DATA_EXTENDED_HEADER_LENGTH + APS_AUXILIARY_HEADER_LENGTH)
00081 
00083 #define APS_MAX_DATA_FRAME_FOOTER_LENGTH  4U
00084 
00085 #endif /* _LINK_SECURITY_ */
00086 
00088 #define APS_MAX_TX_ASDU_SIZE  (NWK_MAX_TX_NSDU_SIZE - APS_COMMON_DATA_FRAME_HEADER_LENGTH)
00089 
00091 #define APS_MAX_RX_ASDU_SIZE \
00092   (NWK_MAX_RX_NSDU_SIZE - APS_COMMON_DATA_FRAME_HEADER_LENGTH - APS_DATA_EXTENDED_HEADER_LENGTH)
00093 
00095 #define APS_MAX_ASDU_SIZE \
00096   (NWK_MAX_NSDU_SIZE - APS_MAX_DATA_FRAME_HEADER_LENGTH - APS_MAX_DATA_FRAME_FOOTER_LENGTH)
00097 
00098 #define APS_MAX_NON_SECURITY_ASDU_SIZE \
00099   (NWK_MAX_NSDU_SIZE - APS_COMMON_DATA_FRAME_HEADER_LENGTH)
00100 
00102 #define APS_MAX_INTERPAN_ASDU_SIZE \
00103   (MAC_MAX_INTERPAN_MSDU_SIZE - APS_COMMON_INTERPAN_FRAME_HEADER_LENGTH)
00104 
00106 #define APS_ASDU_OFFSET \
00107   (NWK_NSDU_OFFSET + APS_MAX_DATA_FRAME_HEADER_LENGTH)
00108 
00110 #define APS_AFFIX_LENGTH \
00111   (NWK_AFFIX_LENGTH + APS_MAX_DATA_FRAME_HEADER_LENGTH + APS_MAX_DATA_FRAME_FOOTER_LENGTH)

00130 #define APS_MAX_UNICAST_EXT_ADDRESS   0xfffffffffffffff9ULL
00131 #define APS_INVALID_EXT_ADDRESS       0x0000000000000000ULL

00134 #define APS_BROADCAST_ALL_EXT_ADDRESS               0xffffffffffffffffULL
00135 #define APS_BROADCAST_RX_ON_WHEN_IDLE_EXT_ADDRESS   0xfffffffffffffffdULL

00139 #define APS_SM_INVALID_FRAME_COUNTER_VALUE  (0xffffffffUL)
00140 
00141 /* Special value for extended address indicates unspecific (can be used with every
00142    device) address: e.g. can be used in Key Pair Set to indicate a global key entries. */
00143 #define APS_UNIVERSAL_EXTENDED_ADDRESS APS_BROADCAST_ALL_EXT_ADDRESS
00144 /* Special value of apsTrustCenterAddress indicates distrubuted trust center mode. */
00145 #define APS_DISTRIBUTED_TC_ADDRESS APS_UNIVERSAL_EXTENDED_ADDRESS
00146 
00147 /* These definitions are deprecated and shouldn't be used */
00148 #define APS_SM_BROADCAST_EXT_ADDRESS                     APS_BROADCAST_ALL_EXT_ADDRESS
00149 #define APS_SM_BROADCAST_ALL_EXT_ADDRESS                 APS_BROADCAST_ALL_EXT_ADDRESS
00150 #define APS_SM_BROADCAST_RX_ON_WHEN_IDLE_EXT_ADDRESS     APS_BROADCAST_RX_ON_WHEN_IDLE_EXT_ADDRESS
00151 #define APS_SM_BROADCAST_ALL_ROUTERS_EXT_ADDRESS         APS_BROADCAST_ALL_ROUTERS_EXT_ADDRESS
00152 #define APS_SM_BROADCAST_LOW_POWER_ROUTERS_EXT_ADDRESS   APS_BROADCAST_LOW_POWER_ROUTERS_EXT_ADDRESS
00153 #define APS_SM_UNIVERSAL_TRUST_CENTER_EXT_ADDRESS        APS_UNIVERSAL_EXTENDED_ADDRESS
00154 #define APS_LAST_UNICAST_ADDRESS                         APS_MAX_UNICAST_EXT_ADDRESS
00155 #define APS_SM_INVALID_EXT_ADDRESS                       APS_INVALID_EXT_ADDRESS

00161 #define APS_MAX_STANDARD_PROFILE_ID 0x7FFF
